spells.name: Fire Snake
spells.description: Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.

spells.name: Geyser
spells.description: Creates a geyser of boiling water.

spells.name: Hungry Pit
spells.description: As create pit, but dealing 4d6 damage to those in it as it closes.

spells.name: Life Bubble
spells.description: Protects creatures from sustained environmental effects.

spells.name: Pain Strike, Mass
spells.description: As pain, but affects multiple creatures.

spells.name: Planar Adaptation
spells.description: Resist harmful effects of other plane.
